lead_paragraph: Amir Khan trained for his boxing match with Zab Judah this weekend in Las Vegas, while in Shanghai the world swimming championships featured the women’s 10-kilometer open water event.
snippet: Amir Khan trained for his boxing match with Zab Judah this weekend in Las Vegas, while in Shanghai the world swimming championships featured the women’s 10-kilometer open water event.
